snippet.textDisplay: This was the first somewhat enjoyable Sonic game in years. However, once I played Sonic Colors, I was blown away. It's possible that this might be the start of a comeback for the blue blur.

snippet.textDisplay: I do like Sonic Unleashed a lot but I agree with your point wholeheartedly. The Werehog levels weren't that fun. The Sonic stages however I think are the best I've ever seen. I hope the next game would be all Sonic with stages just like these. At least Sonic Team somewhat headed in a right direction with this Sonic game.
snippet.textOriginal: I do like Sonic Unleashed a lot but I agree with your point wholeheartedly. The Werehog levels weren't that fun. The Sonic stages however I think are the best I've ever seen. I hope the next game would be all Sonic with stages just like these. At least Sonic Team somewhat headed in a right direction with this Sonic game.

snippet.textDisplay: I played Unleashed for the 360 today and I thought it was pretty good! I had tons of fun with it. I don't know why people bash it so much.

snippet.textDisplay: Agreed. I understand that people like Adventure 1 better, but to me I liked Unleashed SO MUCH more, it was actually FUN to explore the hubs in Unleashed. You also bring up a good point, people say they don't like Unleashed because half the game is not "true sonic" yet they love Adventure 1 where 5/6 of the game is not "true sonic." Bunch of hypocrites I swear. XP
snippet.textOriginal: Agreed. I understand that people like Adventure 1 better, but to me I liked Unleashed SO MUCH more, it was actually FUN to explore the hubs in Unleashed. You also bring up a good point, people say they don't like Unleashed because half the game is not "true sonic" yet they love Adventure 1 where 5/6 of the game is not "true sonic." Bunch of hypocrites I swear. XP

snippet.textDisplay:
"Ignoring Big."  You said it yourself, there's a NECESSARY COMPONENT of Sonic Adventure that sucks.

Plus, SU has decent voice-acting in the cutscenes, no stupid treasure hunts in the main story, and a decent system.  The only downside is the whole let's-make-WereSonic-walk-down-a-million-balance-beams thing.
snippet.textOriginal:
"Ignoring Big."  You said it yourself, there's a NECESSARY COMPONENT of Sonic Adventure that sucks.

Plus, SU has decent voice-acting in the cutscenes, no stupid treasure hunts in the main story, and a decent system.  The only downside is the whole let's-make-WereSonic-walk-down-a-million-balance-beams thing.

snippet.textDisplay:
I was going to put some more of the awesome music from the first two games, but Ehal256 mentioned Sonic 3 and I ran with it.  Sonic CD has some great music as well.

S&K didn't have MJ's music.  The pedo case happened just before s3 was released, so Sonic Team dropped MJ for good about the same time. S&K's music is all Sonic Team.

That's also why the "Come On" boss music isn't in lock-on or S&K.
snippet.textOriginal:
I was going to put some more of the awesome music from the first two games, but Ehal256 mentioned Sonic 3 and I ran with it.  Sonic CD has some great music as well.

S&K didn't have MJ's music.  The pedo case happened just before s3 was released, so Sonic Team dropped MJ for good about the same time. S&K's music is all Sonic Team.

That's also why the "Come On" boss music isn't in lock-on or S&K.

snippet.textDisplay: Sorry, but the existence of Big the Cat, and the horrible voice acting, kind of killed it for me.  Plus the treasure hunting missions.  I'm sorry, but hunting for items should be relegated to optional side-quests, not made a vital part of the game!  It's Sonic.  It's about rushing through at high speed!
snippet.textOriginal: Sorry, but the existence of Big the Cat, and the horrible voice acting, kind of killed it for me.  Plus the treasure hunting missions.  I'm sorry, but hunting for items should be relegated to optional side-quests, not made a vital part of the game!  It's Sonic.  It's about rushing through at high speed!

snippet.textDisplay: I'll +1 it for saying Unleashed is good, because it is. (360/PS3 version anyway.) But Sonic Adventure series has always been one of his better games aside from Sonic 3 & Knuckles.
snippet.textOriginal: I'll +1 it for saying Unleashed is good, because it is. (360/PS3 version anyway.) But Sonic Adventure series has always been one of his better games aside from Sonic 3 & Knuckles.

snippet.textDisplay: I consider Sonic Unleashed to be a good Sonic game.  Not as good as the originals, certainly, but it makes Sonic Adventure look like the sorry joke that it is.
snippet.textOriginal: I consider Sonic Unleashed to be a good Sonic game.  Not as good as the originals, certainly, but it makes Sonic Adventure look like the sorry joke that it is.

snippet.textDisplay:
Angel Island Zone
Ice Cap Zone
Launch Base Zone
Flying Battery Zone
Sandopolis Zone
"Come on" Boss Theme
Knuckles's Theme (S&K version)
Boss--Death Egg Zone
Doomsday Zone

Look those up some time.  The music kicked ass.

Also, Scrap Brain Zone, from the original Sonic, is pretty good techno, but it does tend to get stuck in your head.
snippet.textOriginal:
Angel Island Zone

Also, Scrap Brain Zone, from the original Sonic, is pretty good techno, but it does tend to get stuck in your head.

snippet.textDisplay:
Not nearly as good as the Genesis games, but still WAY better than the swill Sonic Team's been peddling for the past decade.  If you have a Wii, do yourself a favor and get the Wii version--the controls aren't retardedly loose in that one.

Be warned--it is addictive.
snippet.textOriginal:
Not nearly as good as the Genesis games, but still WAY better than the swill Sonic Team's been peddling for the past decade.  If you have a Wii, do yourself a favor and get the Wii version--the controls aren't retardedly loose in that one.

Be warned--it is addictive.
